# Class History

Class for managing conversation history. Provides functionality to track agent speech and actions.

##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

destroy

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new History(history: [HistoryItemInterface](/types/core_history.HistoryItemInterface)[]): [History]()

Creates a new History instance with the provided history items.

#### Parameters

    * history: [HistoryItemInterface](/types/core_history.HistoryItemInterface)[]

Array of history items (agent speech or actions)

#### Returns [History]()




## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this history.

#### Returns void
